description.english: Finish the prelude.
description.german: Schließ der Prolog ab
description.french: Terminer le Prélude
description.spanish: Termina el Preludio

description.english: Finish The First Chapter.
description.german: Schließ das erste Kapitel ab
description.french: Terminer le Premier Chapitre
description.spanish: Termina el Primer Capítulo

description.english: Finish The Second Chapter.
description.german: Schließ das zweite Kapitel ab
description.french: Terminer le Deuxième Chapitre
description.spanish: Termina el Segundo Capítulo

description.english: Finish The Interlude.
description.german: Schließ das Intermezzo ab
description.french: Terminer l'Interlude
description.spanish: Termina el Interludio

description.english: Finish The Third Chapter.
description.german: Schließ das dritte Kapitel ab
description.french: Terminer le Troisième Chapitre
description.spanish: Termina el Tercer Capítulo

description.english: Finish The Game.
description.german: Das Spiel beenden.
description.french: Terminer le Jeu
description.spanish: Termina el Juego

description.english: Use the hint option for a fist time.
description.german: Verwirrt, hm? Nun, das solltest du.
description.french: Vous êtes perdu(e)s ? C'est normal.
description.italian: Confuso, vero? Beh, è giusto che sia così.
description.spanish: Estás confuso, ¿a que sí? Bien, pues deberías estarlo.
description.russian: Нажать в первый раз на подсказку.

description.english: Talk through every dialogue option with Dan.
description.german: Es geht nur im Dan, immer und immer wieder.
description.french: Dan par-ci, Dan par là.
description.italian: Quindi si tratta sempre di Dan.
description.spanish: Siempre, siempre se trata de Dan.
description.russian: Поговорить с Дэном на все темы.

description.english: Try to find a secret safe behind every picture in Darkestville.
description.german: Es ist nichts hinter dem Bild.
description.french: Il n'y a rien derrière le tableau.
description.italian: Non c'è niente dietro il quadro.
description.spanish: No hay nada tras el cuadro.
description.russian: Попробовать поискать сейф за картинами в Даркествилле.

description.english: Fix the broken machine in the basement.
description.german: Du hast Talent dafür.
description.french: Quel talent.
description.italian: Sei un vero talento.
description.spanish: Tienes talento.

description.english: Poke around in every trashcan in Darkestville.
description.german: Müll ist wichtig… meistens.
description.french: Les poubelles sont précieuses… en général.
description.italian: La spazzatura è importante… generalmente.
description.spanish: La basura importa… la mayoría de veces.

displayName.italian: Il club degli amici di Cid

description.english: Have a look at every single person in Darkestville.
description.german: Darkestville ist eine Stadt der Kommunikation.
description.french: À Darkestville, on communique.
description.italian: Darkestville è una città comunicativa.
description.spanish: Darkestville es un pueblo comunicado

description.english: Have a look at every tombstone in Darkestville.
description.german: Wer waren diese Leute?
description.french: Qui sont ces gens ?
description.italian: Chi erano quei tipi?
description.spanish: ¿Quiénes son estos tíos?

description.english: Give some sedative to Walrus.
description.german: Deine Mama hat immer gesagt, du solltest nicht trinken, wenn du nicht sicher bist.
description.french: Maman disait toujours "il ne faut pas boire ce qui n'inspire pas confiance".
description.italian: Tua mamma diceva sempre di non bere cose di cui non sei sicuro.
description.spanish: Tu madre siempre decía que uno no debería beber algo si no está seguro.

description.english: Get the second key.
description.german: Ich schwöre, ich habe es gesehen!
description.french: Je vous jure, je l'ai vu !
description.italian: Lo giuro, l'ho visto!.
description.spanish: ¡Juro que lo he visto!

description.english: Ask all three of Romero brothers about Dan.
description.german: Ich schätze, ich weiß nichts über Dan. Er ist so ein netter Typ!
description.french: Apparemment, je ne connaissais pas bien Dan. Quel chic type !
description.italian: Sembra che non sapessi granché a proposito di Dan. È un bravo ragazzo!
description.spanish: Parece que no conocía bien a Dan. ¡Es muy simpático!
description.russian: Распросить троих Ромеро о том, как они узнали в Сиде Дэна.

description.english: Try to flirt with Foxy.
description.german: He-he-he… he-he-he
description.french: Héhéhé… héhéhé
description.italian: Eh eh eh… eh eh eh
description.spanish: Je, je, je…. Je, je, je

displayName.french: Le maître des clés de l'enfer
displayName.spanish: El maestro de las llaves del Infierno

description.english: Get all 3 keys.
description.german: Es ist wichtig, nicht von der Kiste gefressen zu werden.
description.french: L'important, c'est de ne pas se faire avaler par un coffre.
description.italian: L'importante è non farsi mangiare dal forziere.
description.spanish: Es importante que no te coma el cofre demoníaco.

description.english: Get out of the castle cell.
description.german: Wie ich sagte, du hast Talent.
description.french: Vraiment, quel talent !
description.italian: Come dicevo, sei un vero talento.
description.spanish: Como ya he dicho, se te da bien.

description.english: Talk with Jeff about Good stuff.
description.german: Erinnerst du dich, was Wasser und Gremlins gemeinsam haben?
description.french: Qu'ont en commun l'eau et les gremlins ?
description.italian: Ricordi cos'è che hanno in comune acqua e gremlins?
description.spanish: ¿Te acuerdas? ¿Qué tienen en común el agua y los gremlins?

description.english: Get a tomato and talk through every dialogue option with Vegetable Demon.
description.german: Traust du immer noch Veganern?
description.french: Les vegans vous inspirent toujours confiance ?
description.italian: Ti fidi ancora dei vegani?
description.spanish: ¿Todavía confías en los veganos?
description.russian: Получить помидор и поговорить с Овощемонстром на все темы.

description.english: Have a look at every demon in Darkestville.
description.german: Tote neue Welt.
description.french: L'enfer sur Terre.
description.italian: Nuovo mondo infernale.
description.spanish: El Nuevo Mundo de ultratumba
description.russian: Осмотреть всех демонов, что обосновались в Даркествилле.

description.english: Talk through every dialogue option with Werewolf by the tavern.
description.german: Welch ein politisch korrekter Lykantrop.
description.french: Ce loup-garou aime le politiquement correct.
description.italian: Che licantropo politicamente corretto.
description.spanish: Qué licántropo tan políticamente correcto.
description.russian: Поговорить с оборотнем у таверны на все темы.

description.english: Talk with Pig Demon about joining Demon Trade Union.
description.german: Im Ernst? Wie langweilig?
description.french: Vraiment ? Quel ennui !
description.italian: Dici sul serio? Che noia!
description.spanish: ¿Hablas en serio? ¿Qué rollo?
description.russian: Поговорить со Свинодемоном про вступление в профсоюз.

description.english: Talk through every dialogue option with Fly.
description.german: Bzzz? Bzzzzh!
description.french: Bzzz ? Bzzzzh !
description.italian: Bzzz? Bzzzzh!
description.spanish: ¿Bzzz? ¡Bzzzzh!
description.russian: Поговорить с Мухой на все темы.

description.english: Read the whole biology textbook.
description.german: Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Pilzen und Buttercups?
description.french: Quelle est la différence entre les champignons et les boutons d'or ?
description.italian: Che differenza c'è tra i funghi e i ranuncoli?
description.spanish: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre los champiñones y las libélulas?

description.english: Win at dice with sugar cubes.
description.german: Presto! Warum hast du daran nicht früher gedacht?
description.french: Presto ! Pourquoi n'y ai-je pas pensé avant ?
description.italian: Ecco fatto! Perché non ci ho pensato prima?
description.spanish: ¡Abracadabra! ¿Por qué no se me había ocurrido antes?
description.russian: Выиграть в кости с помощью кубиков сахара.

description.english: Talk with Giovanny in the Tavern about T.Rex.
description.german: Mauer? Welche Mauer?
description.french: Un mur ? Quel mur ?
description.italian: Muro? Quale muro?
description.spanish: ¿Qué? ¿Qué muro?
description.russian: Поговорить с Джованни в таверне, попросить у него тиранозавра.

description.english: Talk with Sailor Demon about his… ship and find a way to get it from him.
description.german: Es hat vielleicht keine Räder, aber es ist immer noch ein Motorrad.
description.french: Même sans roues… c'est une moto !
description.italian: Potrà anche non avere ruote, ma è pur sempre una motocicletta.
description.spanish: Puede que no tenga ruedas, pero todavía es una moto.
description.russian: Поговорить с Демоном-моряком о кораблике и получить его.

description.english: Get Walrus his coffee.
description.german: (hier läuft ein großartiger Jingle)
description.french: (Jingle génial)
description.italian: (qui parte un meraviglioso jingle)
description.spanish: (suena una canción increíble)

description.english: Cure both Mongoose and Walrus.
description.german: Du wolltest nicht, aber du musstest.
description.french: Vous n'en aviez pas envie, mais il le fallait.
description.italian: Non volevi, ma hai dovuto farlo.
description.spanish: No querías, pero tenías que hacerlo.

description.english: Fulfil every strike demand of Pig Demon.
description.german: Warum bin ich dem Dämonenhandelsabkommen nicht beigetreten?
description.french: Pourquoi n'ai-je pas intégré le Syndicat des Démons ?
description.italian: Perché non mi sono iscritto al Sindacato Demoniaco?
description.spanish: ¿Por qué no me uní al Sindicato Demoníaco?

description.english: Solve the Underworld Gateway puzzle.
description.german: Die wahre Hölle ist der technische Support.
description.french: Le véritable Enfer, c'est le support technique.
description.italian: Il vero Inferno è il supporto tecnico.
description.spanish: El verdadero infierno es el soporte técnico.

description.english: Try all possible Underworld Gateway password combinations.
description.german: Du bist nicht gerade ein Hacker.
description.french: On a vu mieux, comme hacker.
description.italian: Non sei poi questo gran hacker.
description.spanish: No eres un buen hacker
description.russian: Перебрать все варианты пароля для Врат.

description.english: Meet Alberto.
description.german: Du hast deinen Seelenverwandten getroffen.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé votre âme soeur !
description.italian: Hai trovato il tuo spirito affine.
description.spanish: Has encontrado a tu alma gemela.

description.english: Read the Survivalist Magazine.
description.german: Zumindest haben wir einen Gutschein gefunden.
description.french: Il y a un bon à l'intérieur, c'est déjà ça.
description.italian: Almeno abbiamo trovato un coupon all'interno
description.spanish: Por lo menos hemos encontrado un cupón.

description.english: Buy video recorder back.
description.german: Ich sagte, du hast Talent, oder?
description.french: Vous avez du talent, je l'ai toujours dit !
description.italian: Te l'avevo detto che sei un talento, non è vero?
description.spanish: Al menos he dicho que tienes talento, ¿verdad?

description.english: Try every drink at the bar and find 3 diamonds.
description.german: Es ist ziemlich schwer, zu Alkohol nein zu sagen.
description.french: Difficile de résister à l'alcool
description.italian: È molto difficile dire no all'alcool.
description.spanish: Es muy difícil decir que no al alcohol.
description.russian: Попробовать все напитки в баре и найти 3 бриллианта.

description.english: Build a bridge over the Lavafall.
description.german: Wir brennen keine Brücken nieder - wir bauen sie!
description.french: On ne coupe pas les ponts - on les construit !
description.italian: Noi non bruciamo i ponti - li costruiamo!
description.spanish: ¡No quemamos puentes, los construimos!

description.english: Find a secret entrance at the Lavafall.
description.german: Ich wusste nicht, dass es da ist.
description.french: J'ignorais que c'était là.
description.italian: Non sapevo che fosse lì.
description.spanish: No sabía que estaba aquí.

description.english: Read the whole book about ghosts.
description.german: Du bist jetzt nicht nur ein Biologe.
description.french: Vous êtes plus qu'un biologiste, à présent.
description.italian: Ora non sei solo un biologo.
description.spanish: Ahora no solo eres biólogo.

description.english: Summon the ghost and talk through every dialogue option with him.
description.german: Dieser Geist kommt dir irgendwie bekannt vor.
description.french: Ce fantôme vous paraît vaguement familier.
description.italian: Questo fantasma ti è vagamente familiare.
description.spanish: El fantasma se te parece un poco.
description.russian: Вызвать призрака и поговорить с ним на все темы.

description.english: Find a message from Cid’s parents and get the detonator.
description.german: Ich schätze, so langsam füge ich alles zusammen (eigentlich nicht).
description.french: J'ai l'impression que tout se met en place.
description.italian: Credo di stare iniziando a mettere insieme i puntini (anzi no).
description.spanish: Supongo que estoy empezando a entenderlo (la verdad es que no).
description.russian: Найти послание от родителей Сида и получить детонатор.

description.english: Run into Vigo for three times.
description.german: Es ist sinnlos, Vigo, sinnlos!
description.french: Laisse tomber Vigo, ça ne sert à rien !
description.italian: È inutile, Vigo, è inutile!
description.spanish: ¡Es inútil, Vigo, inútil!
description.russian: 3 раза нарваться на Виго в его замке.
